paper_dropbox_requests.description: Please upload all the material for {UID} that has been requested.

Hello

upload_request.subject: IEEE VIS 2022 Upload Request
upload_request.body_html:
IEEE VIS 2022 Upload Request

http://ieeevis.org/

Dear {Contributor(s)},

Congratulations once again on the acceptance to VIS 2022 of your paper with paper ID {UID}, entitled {Title}.

As per the instructions you received in the final acceptance email, the final camera ready papers and supplemental materials are to be uploaded via the PCS submission system by August 1.

We also kindly remind you that early registration for the conference is due by September 2. Regardless of attendance modality, one author/presenter for each work is required to register at the rates outlined on http://ieeevis.org/year/2022/info/registration/conference-registration.

In this email instructions concerning the upload of additional submission items required (video preview, pre-recorded talk, etc.) as well as some additional information needed concerning publication details. Five points that require your action are listed below, please read carefully and follow the links to finalize your submission. Detailed information and instructions regarding the preparation of all items listed are available here: http://ieeevis.org/year/2022/info/presenter-information/final-information-paper-authors.

  1. Video Preview Submission

    Your mandatory 25-second video preview should be uploaded via this Dropbox link: [Dropbox link]

    The link is specific for material relating to your paper with id {UID}.

    Instructions regarding the creation of the video preview are available here: http://ieeevis.org/year/2022/info/presenter-information/fast-forward-and-video-previews.

    The deadline for the video preview is August 15.

  2. Paper Presentation Video Recording

    All VIS papers should be accompanied by a recording of the paper presentation. The video recording of your presentation for your paper with id {UID} should be uploaded via this Dropbox link: [Dropbox link]

    The link is the same as for the video preview and is specific for material relating to your paper with id {UID}.

    Detailed instructions regarding these paper presentation recordings are available here: http://ieeevis.org/year/2022/info/presenter-information/talk-recording-guide.

    The deadline for the presentation video recording is September 8.

  3. Representative Image

    As described in the talk recording guide (http://ieeevis.org/year/2022/info/presenter-information/talk-recording-guide), it is also mandatory for authors to submit a representative image with caption for use on the virtual website.

    The same paper specific Dropbox link as above should be used for uploading the representative image: [Dropbox link].

    The deadline for the representative image is September 8.

    For these first three Dropbox uploads please follow the naming conventions specified in the detailed instructions page: http://ieeevis.org/year/2022/info/presenter-information/talk-recording-guide.

    After uploading files via Dropbox, we perform some initial checks automatically. Please visit [Upload Check URL] to check the results of this test.

  4. Author Information Form

    Additional information regarding your paper presentation and publication is needed. Specifically information regarding (a) who will be presenting the paper, (b) in person or virtual attendance, (c) if you have posted your paper to a preprint server (and where), (d) if this publication is subject to Plan S, and (e) practitioner information.

    Please visit this link and complete the corresponding form: [Google Form Link]. Please use your paper submission ID: {UID} when filling in the form.

    Deadline for completing the form is September 8.

  5. Copyright Release

    Finally, for papers that will be published in IEEE TVCG or on IEEE Xplore, authors are asked to complete a copyright release form.

    This is handled via IEEE’s Conference Publishing Services (IEEE CPS) via the following link: [CPS link].

    Deadline for completing the copyright release form is September 8.

Please carefully go through and complete the list of tasks by the above given deadlines. If you have any questions don’t hesitate to contact the publications chairs at publications@ieeevis.org.

Best regards,

IEEE VIS 2022 Publications Chairs

Arvind Satyanarayan, Jian Zhao, and Katerina Vrotsou
